description: Source file for the HowItWorksPage component, which is a React functional component rendering a marketing informational page with sections like hero, flow steps, FAQ, and call-to-action buttons for a roadside assistance platform.

methods.name: FlowStep({ n, icon, title, subtitle, bullets })
methods.description: A functional component that renders a step in the flow process with icon, title, subtitle, and bullets.

methods.name: FaqItem({ q, a, open, onToggle, id })
methods.description: A functional component representing a single FAQ item with toggle functionality to show or hide the answer.

methods.name: HowItWorksPage()
methods.description: Main component exporting the page that displays flow steps, FAQ, and call-to-action sections for the roadside assistance platform.

ctags.name: FaqItem
ctags.pattern: /^function FaqItem({ q, a, open, onToggle, id }) {$/

ctags.name: FlowStep
ctags.pattern: /^function FlowStep({ n, icon, title, subtitle, bullets }) {$/
